firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Quad J Realty
firm_information.location: 1305 N. E. Big Bend Trail Glen Rose, TX 76043

house_listing.house_description: This cute frame sits on a beautiful wooded lot. Private with lots of wildlife. Large open concept great room WBFP & high ceilings on first floor. Covered porches up and down, and both bedrooms have balconies that overlook back yard. Well cared for and maintained. Large wooden deck perfect for barbeques!

highlights.item: Large Living Areas with Open Concept
